name: The Obsidian Whisper: Valerius's Gambit
description: Councilman Valerius has been identified as the one seeking the complete Staff of Whispered Dominion for a dark ritual. Infiltrate his heavily guarded manor in Gall, navigate its defenses, and secure the staff from his ritual chamber in the cellars before he can complete his profane preparations.
reward: Significant gold reward + XP (based on success)
